pageContext.claim: “Dr. Fauci said don't wear masks and now he says wear them.”
pageContext.analysis: Anthony Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases since 1984, has explained that officials were originally concerned that there would be a shortage of masks for health professionals and so that's why the original recommendation was made -- a recommendation that in retrospect was a mistake. Trump is using this incident to try to discredit Fauci's advice, without acknowledging the circumstances.
